scripts.production: NODE_ENV=production docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up --force-recreate --build -d && docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml logs && docker image prune -f
scripts.clean:docker: docker stop $(docker ps -qa) && docker rm $(docker ps -qa) && docker rmi -f $(docker images -qa) && docker volume rm $(docker volume ls -q) && docker network rm $(docker network ls -q)
